00060                              public MouseMotionListener, 
00061                              public MouseListener{

00072                        CEGUI::Renderer* renderer);
00073        
00074 
00075       void setCamera(Camera*);
00076

00079 
00080

00082       virtual bool frameEnded(const FrameEvent& evt);

00087       void mouseReleased (MouseEvent *e);

00093       void mouseExited(MouseEvent* e) {}
